languages.text: {n}Хмыкнув, Ульфар нехотя признает:{/n} "Говорит о чести перед смертью. У этих древних ксеносов определенно есть представление о воинском мужестве и достоинстве. Возможно, старики правы, и с веками все измельчало. Даже нелюдь".

{n}Clearing his throat, Ulfar grudgingly admits,{/n} "He speaks of honour before death. These ancient xenos certainly have an understanding of battle courage and honour. Perhaps the old ones are right, and everything has become degraded over the centuries. Even inhumans."
languages.original_text: {n}Хмыкнув, Ульфар нехотя признает:{/n} "Говорит о чести перед смертью. У этих древних ксеносов определенно есть представление о воинском мужестве и достоинстве. Возможно, старики правы, и с веками все измельчало. Даже нелюдь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Clearing his throat, Ulfar grudgingly admits,{/n} "He speaks of honour before death. These ancient xenos certainly have an understanding of battle courage and honour. Perhaps the old ones are right, and everything has become degraded over the centuries. Even inhumans."

{n}Clearing his throat, Ulfar grudgingly admits,{/n} "He speaks of honour before death. These ancient xenos certainly have an understanding of battle courage and honour. Perhaps the old ones are right, and everything has become degraded over the centuries. Even inhumans."

{n}Clearing his throat, Ulfar grudgingly admits,{/n} "He speaks of honour before death. These ancient xenos certainly have an understanding of battle courage and honour. Perhaps the old ones are right, and everything has become degraded over the centuries. Even inhumans."

{n}Clearing his throat, Ulfar grudgingly admits,{/n} "He speaks of honour before death. These ancient xenos certainly have an understanding of battle courage and honour. Perhaps the old ones are right, and everything has become degraded over the centuries. Even inhumans."

languages.text: {n}咳払いをして、ウルファーはしぶしぶ了承する。{/n}「奴は死ぬ前の名誉について話してる。こんな古代の異種族が、戦いの勇気と栄誉を確かに理解してるんだ。〈旧き者〉の言うとおりだろう、何世紀も経つうちに、何もかもが堕落しちまったんだ。人ならざるものであっても」
languages.original_text: {n}Clearing his throat, Ulfar grudgingly admits,{/n} "He speaks of honour before death. These ancient xenos certainly have an understanding of battle courage and honour. Perhaps the old ones are right, and everything has become degraded over the centuries. Even inhumans."

traits.locale_text: {n}咳払いをして、ウルファーはしぶしぶ了承する。{/n}「奴は死ぬ前の名誉について話してる。こんな古代の異種族が、戦いの勇気と栄誉を確かに理解してるんだ。〈旧き者〉の言うとおりだろう、何世紀も経つうちに、何もかもが堕落しちまったんだ。人ならざるものであっても」

languages.text: {n}乌尔法清了清嗓子，勉强承认道：{/n}“他死前所说确实是荣耀之语，这些古老的异形确实懂得战斗的勇气与荣誉。或许那些老家伙们说得没错，几个世纪以来，所有的一切都堕落了。包括异形。”
languages.original_text: {n}Clearing his throat, Ulfar grudgingly admits,{/n} "He speaks of honour before death. These ancient xenos certainly have an understanding of battle courage and honour. Perhaps the old ones are right, and everything has become degraded over the centuries. Even inhumans."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法清了清嗓子，勉强承认道：{/n}“他死前所说确实是荣耀之语，这些古老的异形确实懂得战斗的勇气与荣誉。或许那些老家伙们说得没错，几个世纪以来，所有的一切都堕落了。包括异形。”

languages.text: {n}Ulfar se racle la gorge et admet à contrecœur :{/n} « Il parle de l'honneur face à la mort. Ces xénos comprennent parfaitement le courage et l'honneur des combattants. Les anciens ont peut-être raison ; tout s'est dégradé au fil des siècles, même les non-humains. »
languages.original_text: {n}Clearing his throat, Ulfar grudgingly admits,{/n} "He speaks of honour before death. These ancient xenos certainly have an understanding of battle courage and honour. Perhaps the old ones are right, and everything has become degraded over the centuries. Even inhumans."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar se racle la gorge et admet à contrecœur :{/n} « Il parle de l'honneur face à la mort. Ces xénos comprennent parfaitement le courage et l'honneur des combattants. Les anciens ont peut-être raison ; tout s'est dégradé au fil des siècles, même les inhumains. »

languages.text: {n}Ulfar se aclara la garganta y admite a regañadientes:{/n} «Habla de honor antes de morir. Los xenos antiguos comprenden el valor de la batalla y el honor. Tal vez los ancianos tengan razón y haya ido todo a peor con el paso de los siglos. Incluso para los inhumanos».
languages.original_text: {n}Clearing his throat, Ulfar grudgingly admits,{/n} "He speaks of honour before death. These ancient xenos certainly have an understanding of battle courage and honour. Perhaps the old ones are right, and everything has become degraded over the centuries. Even inhumans."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar se aclara la garganta y admite a regañadientes:{/n} «Habla de honor antes de morir. Los xenos antiguos comprenden el valor de la batalla y el honor. Tal vez los ancianos tengan razón y haya ido todo a peor con el paso de los siglos. Incluso para los inhumanos».

languages.text: {n}Mit einem Räuspern räumt Ulfar zerknirscht ein:{/n} "Er spricht von Ehre vor dem Tod. Diese alten Xenos haben tatsächlich ein Gefühl für Tapferkeit in der Schlacht und Ehre. Vielleicht haben die Alten ja recht und alles ist im Laufe der Jahrhunderte schlechter geworden. Selbst Nicht-Menschen."
languages.original_text: {n}Clearing his throat, Ulfar grudgingly admits,{/n} "He speaks of honour before death. These ancient xenos certainly have an understanding of battle courage and honour. Perhaps the old ones are right, and everything has become degraded over the centuries. Even inhumans."

Vielleicht haben die Alten ja recht und alles ist im Laufe der Jahrhunderte schlechter geworden. Selbst Nicht-Menschen."
